Fire.name: Fire
Fire.description:
Global object with classes, properties and methods you can access from anywhere.

See [methods and properties](../classes/Fire.html).

Math.name: Math
Math.description:
Extends the JavaScript built-in object that has properties and methods for mathematical constants and functions.
See [https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Math](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Math)

Fire.name: Fire
Fire.description:
Global object with classes, properties and methods you can access from anywhere

See [classes in Fire module](../modules/Fire.html).

_CallbacksHandler.name: _CallbacksHandler
_CallbacksHandler.description:
The CallbacksHandler is an abstract class that can register and unregister callbacks by key.
Subclasses should implement their own methods about how to invoke the callbacks.

CallbacksInvoker.name: CallbacksInvoker
CallbacksInvoker.description: The callbacks invoker to handle and invoke callbacks by key

Color.name: Color
Color.description:
Representation of RGBA colors.

Each color component is a floating point value with a range from 0 to 1.

You can also use the convenience method <% crosslink Fire.color Fire.color %> to create a new Color.

params.name: r
params.description: - red component of the color

params.name: g
params.description: - green component of the color

params.name: b
params.description: - blue component of the color

params.name: a
params.description: - alpha component of the color

_ObjectFlags.name: _ObjectFlags
_ObjectFlags.description: Bit mask that controls object states.

_DeserializeInfo.name: _DeserializeInfo
_DeserializeInfo.description: !#zh 包含反序列化时的一些信息

HashObject.name: HashObject
HashObject.description:
!#zh 提供获取对象ID的功能，该ID全局唯一但不会被序列化，可用于索引对象。

如果你将对象索引起来，必须记住清除索引，否则对象将永远不会被销毁。

Math.name: Math
Math.description:
Extends the JavaScript built-in object that has properties and methods for mathematical constants and functions.
See [https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Math](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Math)

Matrix23.name: Matrix23
Matrix23.description:
Simple matrix to do 2D affine transformations.
It is actually 3x3 but the last row is [0 0 1].

FObject.name: FObject
FObject.description: The base class of most of all the objects in Fireball.

Rect.name: Rect
Rect.description:
A 2D rectangle defined by x, y position and width, height.

see {% crosslink Fire.rect Fire.rect %}

Sprite.name: Sprite
Sprite.description: Represents a Sprite object which obtained from Texture.

params.name: img
params.description: - Specify the html image element to render so you can create Sprite dynamically.

Texture.name: Texture
Texture.description:
Class for texture handling.
Use this to create textures on the fly or to modify existing texture assets.

params.name: img

Vec2.name: Vec2
Vec2.description:
Representation of 2D vectors and points.

see {% crosslink Fire.v2 Fire.v2 %}

AssetLibrary.name: AssetLibrary
AssetLibrary.description: The asset library which managing loading/unloading assets in project.

Component.name: Component
Component.description:
Base class for everything attached to Entity.

NOTE: Not allowed to use construction parameters for Component's subclasses,
        because Component is created by the engine.

ContentStrategyType.name: ContentStrategyType
ContentStrategyType.description: !#zh 内容适配策略负责缩放摄像机画面以适应画布(Canvas)。

Engine.name: Engine
Engine.description: !#zh 这个模块提供引擎的一些全局接口和状态状态

Entity.name: Entity
Entity.description: Class of all entities in scenes.

params.name: name
params.description: - the name of the entity

EventTarget.name: EventTarget
EventTarget.description:
EventTarget is an object to which an event is dispatched when something has occurred.
Entity are the most common event targets, but other objects can be event targets too.

Event targets are an important part of the Fireball event model.
The event target serves as the focal point for how events flow through the scene graph.
When an event such as a mouse click or a keypress occurs, Fireball dispatches an event object
into the event flow from the root of the hierarchy. The event object then makes its way through
the scene graph until it reaches the event target, at which point it begins its return trip through
the scene graph. This round-trip journey to the event target is conceptually divided into three phases:
- The capture phase comprises the journey from the root to the last node before the event target's node
- The target phase comprises only the event target node
- The bubbling phase comprises any subsequent nodes encountered on the return trip to the root of the tree
See also: http://www.w3.org/TR/DOM-Level-3-Events/#event-flow

Event targets can implement the following methods:
 - _getCapturingTargets
 - _getBubblingTargets

Event.name: Event
Event.description: An event allows for signaling that something has occurred. E.g. that an asset has completed downloading.

params.name: type
params.description: - The name of the event (case-sensitive), e.g. "click", "fire", or "submit"

params.name: bubbles
params.description: - A boolean indicating whether the event bubbles up through the tree or not

params.name: type
params.description: - The name of the event (case-sensitive), e.g. "click", "fire", or "submit".

params.name: nativeEvent
params.description: - The native event object attaching to this event object.

KeyboardEvent.name: KeyboardEvent
KeyboardEvent.description:
KeyboardEvent objects describe a user interaction with the keyboard. Each event describes a key; the event type (keydown, keypress, or keyup) identifies what kind of activity was performed.
This class is just an alias to the Web [KeyboardEvent](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/KeyboardEvent)

MouseEvent.name: MouseEvent
MouseEvent.description:
The MouseEvent interface represents events that occur due to the user interacting with a pointing device (such as a mouse). Common events using this interface include click, dblclick, mouseup, mousedown.

See
- https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/MouseEvent
- http://www.quirksmode.org/dom/w3c_events.html#mousepos

params.name: type
params.description: - The name of the event (case-sensitive), e.g. "click", "fire", or "submit"

LoadManager.name: LoadManager
LoadManager.description:
The manager scheduling resources loading
- It will:
  - select registered loader
  - merge same url request
  - limit the max concurrent request
- It will NOT:
  - cache what has being loaded
  - load depends of resource

Screen.name: Screen
Screen.description: Screen class can be used to access display information.

Screen.ContainerStrategy.name: Screen.ContainerStrategy
Screen.ContainerStrategy.description:
ContainerStrategy class is the root strategy class of container's scale strategy,
it controls the behavior of how to scale the container and canvas.

Screen.ContentStrategy.name: Screen.ContentStrategy
Screen.ContentStrategy.description:
ContentStrategy class is the root strategy class of content's scale strategy,
it controls the behavior of how to scale the scene and setup the viewport for the game.

EqualToFrame.name: EqualToFrame
EqualToFrame.description: Strategy that makes the container's size equals to the frame's size

FixedHeight.name: FixedHeight
FixedHeight.description: Strategy to scale the content's height to container's height and proportionally scale its width.

SpriteRenderer.name: SpriteRenderer
SpriteRenderer.description: Renders a sprite in the scene.

Time.name: Time
Time.description:
The interface to get time information from Fireball.

See [Time](/en/scripting/time/)

Transform.name: Transform
Transform.description: Defines position, rotation and scale of an entity.

classitems.description: Set raw extname for this asset, this method is used for plugin only.

classitems.description:
Tag the class with any meta attributes, then return all current attributes assigned to it.
This function holds only the attributes, not their implementations.
classitems.name: attr

params.name: constructor
params.description: - the class or instance. If instance, the attribute will be dynamic and only available for the specified instance.

params.name: propertyName
params.description: - the name of property or function, used to retrieve the attributes

params.name: attributes
params.description: - the attribute table to mark, new attributes will merged with existed attributes. Attribute whose key starts with '_' will be ignored.

return.description: return all attributes associated with the property. if none undefined will be returned

classitems.description:
By default, all properties declared by "Class.prop" is serializable.
The NonSerialized attribute marks a variable to not be serialized,
so you can keep a property show in the Editor and Fireball will not attempt to serialize it.
See {% crosslink EditorOnly Fire.EditorOnly %} for more details.
classitems.name: NonSerialized

classitems.description:
The EditorOnly attribute marks a variable to be serialized in editor project, but non-serialized
in exported products.
classitems.name: EditorOnly

the metaclass of the "fire class" created by Fire.define, all its static members
will inherited by fire class.

Add new instance field, propertie, or method made available on the class.
该方法定义的变量默认情况下都会被序列化，也会在inspector中显示。
如果传入属性包含Fire.HideInInspector则仍会序列化但不在inspector中显示。
如果传入属性包含Fire.NonSerialized则不会序列化并且不会在inspector中显示。
如果传入属性包含Fire.EditorOnly则只在编辑器下序列化，打包时不序列化。

Do instantiate object, the object to instantiate must be non-nil.
这是一个实例化的通用方法，可能效率比较低。
之后可以给各种类型重载快速实例化的特殊实现，但应该在单元测试中将结果和这个方法的结果进行对比。
值得注意的是，这个方法不可重入。

classitems.description:
Destroy this FObject, and release all its own references to other resources.

After destory, this FObject is not usable any more.
You can use Fire.isValid(obj) (or obj.isValid if obj is non-nil) to check whether the object is destroyed before accessing it.

return.description: whether it is the first time the destroy being called

classitems.description: Return the last portion of a path.
classitems.name: basename

classitems.description:
Return the extension of the path, from the last '.' to end of string in the last portion of the path.
If there is no '.' in the last portion of the path or the first character of it is '.',
then it returns an empty string.
classitems.name: extname
example:
```js
path.extname('index.html')      // returns '.html'
path.extname('index.coffee.md') // returns '.md'
path.extname('index.')          // returns '.'
path.extname('index')           // returns ''
```

classitems.description:
!#zh uuid加载流程：
1. 查找_uuidToAsset，如果已经加载过，直接返回
2. 查找_uuidToCallbacks，如果已经在加载，则注册回调，直接返回
3. 如果没有url，则将uuid直接作为路径
4. 递归加载Asset及其引用到的其它Asset

classitems.description:
Kill references to the asset so it can be garbage collected.
Fireball will reload the asset from disk or remote if loadAssetByUuid being called again.
You rarely use this function in scripts, since it will be called automatically when the Asset is destroyed.

classitems.description:
used in _callOnEnable to ensure onEnable and onDisable will be called alternately
从逻辑上来说OnEnable和OnDisable的交替调用不需要由额外的变量进行保护，但那样会使设计变得复杂
例如Entity.destroy调用后但还未真正销毁时，会调用所有Component的OnDisable。
这时如果又有addComponent，Entity需要对这些新来的Component特殊处理。将来调度器做了之后可以尝试去掉这个标记。
The entity this component is attached to. A component is always attached to an entity.

classitems.description: indicates whether this component is enabled or not.

classitems.description:
Makes a component execute in edit mode.
By default, all components are only executed in play mode,
which means they will not have their callback functions executed while the Editor is in edit mode.
By calling this function, each component will also have its callback executed in edit mode.
classitems.name: executeInEditMode

params.name: constructor
params.description: - the class you want to register, must inherit from Component

Finds an entity by hierarchy path, the path is case-sensitive, and must start with a '/' character.
It will traverse the hierarchy by splitting the path using '/' character.
It is recommended to not use this function every frame instead cache the result at startup.

return.description: the entity or null if not found

classitems.description: Extends Fire._CallbacksHandler to handle and invoke event callbacks.

Register an callback of a specific event type on the EventTarget.
This method is merely an alias to addEventListener.
classitems.name: on

params.name: type
params.description: - A string representing the event type to listen for.

params.name: callback
params.description:
- The callback that will be invoked when the event is dispatched.
                             The callback is ignored if it is a duplicate (the callbacks are unique).

params.name: useCapture
params.description:
- When set to true, the capture argument prevents callback
                             from being invoked when the event's eventPhase attribute value is BUBBLING_PHASE.
                             When false, callback will NOT be invoked when event's eventPhase attribute value is CAPTURING_PHASE.
                             Either way, callback will be invoked when event's eventPhase attribute value is AT_TARGET.

classitems.description:
Removes the callback previously registered with the same type, callback, and capture.
This method is merely an alias to removeEventListener.
classitems.name: off

params.name: type
params.description: - A string representing the event type being removed.

params.name: callback
params.description: - The callback to remove.

params.name: useCapture
params.description:
- Specifies whether the callback being removed was registered as a capturing callback or not.
                             If not specified, useCapture defaults to false. If a callback was registered twice,
                             one with capture and one without, each must be removed separately. Removal of a capturing callback
                             does not affect a non-capturing version of the same listener, and vice versa.

classitems.description: Register an callback of a specific event type on the EventTarget, the callback will remove itself after the first time it is triggered.
classitems.name: once

params.name: type
params.description: - A string representing the event type to listen for.

params.name: callback
params.description:
- The callback that will be invoked when the event is dispatched.
                             The callback is ignored if it is a duplicate (the callbacks are unique).

params.name: useCapture
params.description:
- When set to true, the capture argument prevents callback
                             from being invoked when the event's eventPhase attribute value is BUBBLING_PHASE.
                             When false, callback will NOT be invoked when event's eventPhase attribute value is CAPTURING_PHASE.
                             Either way, callback will be invoked when event's eventPhase attribute value is AT_TARGET.

classitems.description: Dispatches an event into the event flow. The event target is the EventTarget object upon which the dispatchEvent() method is called.
classitems.name: dispatchEvent

params.name: event
params.description: - The Event object that is dispatched into the event flow

return.description:
- returns true if either the event's preventDefault() method was not invoked,
                     or its cancelable attribute value is false, and false otherwise.

classitems.description: Send an event to this object directly, this method will not propagate the event to any other objects.
classitems.name: _doSendEvent

params.name: event
params.description: - The Event object that is sent to this event target.

classitems.description:
Get all the targets listening to the supplied type of event in the target's capturing phase.
The capturing phase comprises the journey from the root to the last node BEFORE the event target's node.
The result should save in the array parameter, and MUST SORT from child nodes to parent nodes.

Subclasses can override this method to make event propagable.

params.name: type
params.description: - the event type

params.name: array
params.description: - the array to receive targets

classitems.description:
Get all the targets listening to the supplied type of event in the target's bubbling phase.
The bubbling phase comprises any SUBSEQUENT nodes encountered on the return trip to the root of the tree.
The result should save in the array parameter, and MUST SORT from child nodes to parent nodes.

Subclasses can override this method to make event propagable.

params.name: type
params.description: - the event type

params.name: array
params.description: - the array to receive targets

classitems.description: The name of the event (case-sensitive), e.g. "click", "fire", or "submit"
classitems.name: type

classitems.description: A reference to the target to which the event was originally dispatched
classitems.name: target

classitems.description: A reference to the currently registered target for the event
classitems.name: currentTarget;

classitems.description:
Indicates which phase of the event flow is currently being evaluated.
Returns an integer value represented by 4 constants:
 - Event.NONE = 0
 - Event.CAPTURING_PHASE = 1
 - Event.AT_TARGET = 2
 - Event.BUBBLING_PHASE = 3
The phases are explained in the [section 3.1, Event dispatch and DOM event flow]
(http://www.w3.org/TR/DOM-Level-3-Events/#event-flow), of the DOM Level 3 Events specification.
classitems.name: eventPhase

classitems.description: A boolean indicating whether the event bubbles up through the hierarchy or not
classitems.name: bubbles

classitems.description: Indicates whether or not event.preventDefault() has been called on the event
classitems.name: _defaultPrevented

classitems.description: Indicates whether or not event.stop() has been called on the event
classitems.name: _propagationStopped

classitems.description: Indicates whether or not event.stop(true) has been called on the event
classitems.name: _propagationImmediateStopped

classitems.description: Events not currently dispatched are in this phase
classitems.name: NONE

classitems.description:
The capturing phase comprises the journey from the root to the last node before the event target's node
see http://www.w3.org/TR/DOM-Level-3-Events/#event-flow
classitems.name: CAPTURING_PHASE

classitems.description:
The target phase comprises only the event target node
see http://www.w3.org/TR/DOM-Level-3-Events/#event-flow
classitems.name: AT_TARGET

classitems.description:
The bubbling phase comprises any subsequent nodes encountered on the return trip to the root of the hierarchy
see http://www.w3.org/TR/DOM-Level-3-Events/#event-flow
classitems.name: BUBBLING_PHASE

classitems.description: Stop propagation. When dispatched in a tree, invoking this method prevents event from reaching any other objects than the current.
classitems.name: stop

params.name: immediate
params.description:
- Indicates whether or not to immediate stop the propagation, default is false.
                                     If true, for this particular event, no other callback will be called.
                                     Neither those attached on the same event target,
                                     nor those attached on targets which will be traversed later.

classitems.description: If invoked when the cancelable attribute value is true, signals to the operation that caused event to be dispatched that it needs to be canceled.
classitems.name: preventDefault

classitems.description: http://www.quirksmode.org/dom/events/index.html
Returns true if the `ctrl` key was down when the event was fired.
classitems.name: ctrlKey

classitems.description: Returns true if the `shift` key was down when the event was fired.
classitems.name: shiftKey

classitems.description: Returns true if the `alt` key was down when the event was fired.
classitems.name: altKey

classitems.description: Returns true if the `meta` key was down when the event was fired.
classitems.name: metaKey

classitems.description:
Returns the current state of the specified modifier key. true if the modifier is active (i.e., the modifier key is pressed or locked). Otherwise, false.

See https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/KeyboardEvent.getModifierState
classitems.name: getModifierState

params.name: keyArg
params.description:
- A modifier key value. The value must be one of the KeyboardEvent.key values which represent modifier keys or "Accel". This is case-sensitive.
                         NOTE: If an application wishes to distinguish between right and left modifiers, this information could be deduced using keyboard events and Fire.KeyboardEvent.location.

return.description: true if it is a modifier key and the modifier is activated, false otherwise.

params.name: nativeEvent
params.description: - The original DOM event

classitems.description:
Indicates which button was pressed on the mouse to trigger the event.

(0: Left button, 1: Wheel button or middle button (if present), 2: Right button)
classitems.name: button

classitems.description:
Indicates which buttons were pressed on the mouse to trigger the event

See https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/MouseEvent.buttons
classitems.name: buttonStates

classitems.description: The X coordinate of the mouse pointer in screen coordinates.
classitems.name: screenX

classitems.description: The Y coordinate of the mouse pointer in screen coordinates.
classitems.name: screenY

classitems.description:
The X coordinate of the mouse pointer relative to the position of the last mousemove event.
Not available for touch event.
classitems.name: deltaX

classitems.description:
The Y coordinate of the mouse pointer relative to the position of the last mousemove event.
Not available for touch event.
classitems.name: deltaY

classitems.description: The secondary target for the event, if there is one.
classitems.name: relatedTarget

classitems.description: Returns whether the current device supports touch input

Register an callback of a specific input event type.

For all supported event and type, please see [Input Events](/en/scripting/input-events)
classitems.name: on

params.name: type
params.description: - eg. "keydown", "click"

Pick the top most entity, using their oriented bounding boxes.

classitems.description: NOTE: Request the same url with different loader is disallowed
classitems.name: loadByLoader

params.name: responseType
params.description: - the XMLHttpRequestResponseType

classitems.description:
A temp fallback to contain the original component which can not be loaded.
Actually, this class will be used whenever a class failed to deserialize,
regardless of whether it is child class of component.
The web renderer implemented rely on pixi.js

render context 将在 pixi 中维护同样的 scene graph，这样做主要是为之后的 clipping 和 culling 提供支持。
这里采用空间换时间的策略，所有 entity 都有对应的 PIXI.DisplayObjectContainer。
毕竟一般 dummy entity 不会很多，因此这样产生的冗余对象可以忽略。
值得注意的是，sprite 等 pixi object，被视为 entity 对应的 PIXI.DisplayObjectContainer 的子物体，
并且排列在所有 entity 之前，以达到最先渲染的效果。
removes a entity and all its children from scene

create child nodes recursively
这个方法假定parent存在

params.name: entity
params.description: - must have parent, and not scene gizmo

return.description:
- the array contains vectors represented in world position,
                   in the sequence of BottomLeft, TopLeft, TopRight, BottomRight

classitems.description:

warnings.message: replacing incorrect tag: returns with return

Missing item type
both getter and prop must register the name into __props__ array

Missing item type
the metaclass of the "fire class" created by Fire.define, all its static members
will inherited by fire class.

Missing item type
Specially optimized define function only for internal base classes

Missing item type
!#en Indicates whether retina mode is enabled currently. Retina mode is enabled by default for Apple device but disabled for other devices.
!#zh 判断当前是否启用 retina 渲染模式。Fire.isRetina 只是表示系统的支持状态，而最终是否启用 retina 则取决于 Fire.isRetinaEnabled。由于安卓太卡，这里默认禁用 retina。

Missing item type
Do instantiate object, the object to instantiate must be non-nil.
这是一个实例化的通用方法，可能效率比较低。
之后可以给各种类型重载快速实例化的特殊实现，但应该在单元测试中将结果和这个方法的结果进行对比。
值得注意的是，这个方法不可重入。

Missing item type
serialize any type

Missing item type
serialize only primitive object type

Missing item type
serialize main object
这个方法主要是对 main object 做特殊处理，虽然和 _serializeObj 很接近，但为了
避免增加 _serializeObj 的额外开销并不和它合并到一起。

Missing item type
Indicate the running browser type

Missing item type
used in _callOnEnable to ensure onEnable and onDisable will be called alternately
从逻辑上来说OnEnable和OnDisable的交替调用不需要由额外的变量进行保护，但那样会使设计变得复杂
例如Entity.destroy调用后但还未真正销毁时，会调用所有Component的OnDisable。
这时如果又有addComponent，Entity需要对这些新来的Component特殊处理。将来调度器做了之后可以尝试去掉这个标记。

Missing item type
invoke starts on entities

Missing item type
This will be called before component callbacks

Missing item type
removes an entity and all its children from scene, this method will NOT be called if it is removed by hierarchy.

Missing item type
Extends Fire._CallbacksHandler to handle and invoke event callbacks.

Missing item type
Get all the targets listening to the supplied type of event in the target's capturing phase.
The capturing phase comprises the journey from the root to the last node BEFORE the event target's node.
The result should save in the array parameter, and MUST SORT from child nodes to parent nodes.

Subclasses can override this method to make event propagable.

Missing item type
Get all the targets listening to the supplied type of event in the target's bubbling phase.
The bubbling phase comprises any SUBSEQUENT nodes encountered on the return trip to the root of the tree.
The result should save in the array parameter, and MUST SORT from child nodes to parent nodes.

Subclasses can override this method to make event propagable.

Missing item type
Returns whether the current device supports touch input

Missing item type
The InteractionContext contains all the entities which can be interact with.

Missing item type
Pick the top most entity, using their oriented bounding boxes.

Missing item type
A temp fallback to contain the original component which can not be loaded.
Actually, this class will be used whenever a class failed to deserialize,
regardless of whether it is child class of component.

Missing item type
The web renderer implemented rely on pixi.js

Missing item type
render context 将在 pixi 中维护同样的 scene graph，这样做主要是为之后的 clipping 和 culling 提供支持。
这里采用空间换时间的策略，所有 entity 都有对应的 PIXI.DisplayObjectContainer。
毕竟一般 dummy entity 不会很多，因此这样产生的冗余对象可以忽略。
值得注意的是，sprite 等 pixi object，被视为 entity 对应的 PIXI.DisplayObjectContainer 的子物体，
并且排列在所有 entity 之前，以达到最先渲染的效果。

Missing item type
removes a entity and all its children from scene

Missing item type
create child nodes recursively
这个方法假定parent存在

Missing item type
create pixi nodes recursively
